page.title: 06DAY IN THE LIFE OF FARM BOY
page.content:
Monday.
I get up at half-past six and I change into my school clothes.Then I have wholewheat cereal ,toast and tea for breakfast.After breakfast I play until about 8.30 when I get ready for school.I walk up the farm road to catch the school taxi at 8.45. We get to school at 9.10. The school opens at9.15. In the morning we do Maths. Our teacher is Mrs.Ross There are only 14 pupils in the whole school because it is a country school. When school finishes at 3.15 I go home in the taxi. I do my homework then I watch T.V.I have tea at 5.00pm.After tea I go to cubs from 6.30 till 8.00. When I get home from cubs I go to bed.
